stories.title: Music for Infants
stories.body: Look at this tiny little pig playing its instrument. It may be small, and it's shitty guitar may be out of tune... but I guarantee you will be plased by its duclet tones. This is a f ull article dtailing large pigs and little pigs and kinda like ANimal Farm but without COmmunism and with Fascism oh wait that was what Animal Farm was allk about, right?
stories.author: Donald Drumpf

stories.title: Strange Relations
stories.body: This guy loves nothing more in the world than trains. That includes his family, his dogs, and his other obsession, collecting old paper towel racks. He only has two friends, that he sees once every six months. They both love trains as well.
stories.author: Burt Rinalds

stories.title: Heart Braking
stories.body: It's likea  princess whats her name shit from alladdin jaits like her sister Jasmine. Jasmine has all the fun, carpet rides, jeanies, jafar. Jafara's beetle juice. I bet jafar makes scarab bbeetle cockctails
stories.author: DDCC
